overview: The lives of Ruben (Noa Claassen) and Floor (Suus Molenaar) are unexpectedly turned upside down when the police arrive at the door one day and inform them that both parents have died that morning. From that moment on, they are faced with the gigantic task of reinventing and picking up life. In the run-up to the funeral, brother and sister each go through their own coping process, so that they risk losing sight of each other. Ruben tries to cling to everything that has been. At the same time, Floor becomes very focused on the future and actually wants to get on with life as quickly as possible.
tagline: Together, Ruben and Floor have to reinvent their lives after the sudden death of their parents.
title: Mijn ouders wonen op Jupiter
